name: Tiny Apocalypse
description:
A tiny FPS zombie apocalypse game in 200kb. The game is made for #4MBJam.  The design objective was to create a game in the smallest file size possible.

Features:

  • FPS gameplay
  • Upgrade system
  • Tons of zombies
  • Everything is generated inside the game. All assets are %100 generated
  • Multiple guns
  • Particles

How to play:

  • WASD to move
  • Use Mouse to look
  • Alternative Look: Arrow keys
  • Left Mouse Click to shoot
  • Alternative Shoot: Right Control Key

Goals:

Follow the road to the end of the city to continue

Upgrade your stats using collected scraps

Traverse 5 cities and reach the helipad.

Survive for 2 minutes against the hordes of zombies

Download the uncompressed version if you're having trouble with compressed one
